title: "AI Assists Doctors in Breast Cancer Screenings in Aberdeen Trial"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence (AI) is being utilized to assist doctors in examining many mammograms at Aberdeen Royal Infirmary, and their research has already shown encouraging results, as it effectively identified early-stage breast cancer."
